description: Gets basic information about the security profile. For information about security profiles, see Security Profiles in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide. For a mapping of the API name and user interface name of the security profile permissions, see List of security profile permissions.

parameters.name: SecurityProfileId
parameters.description: The identifier for the security profle.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the security profile.

nested_items.name: OrganizationResourceId
nested_items.description: The organization resource identifier for the security profile.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the security profile.

nested_items.name: SecurityProfileName
nested_items.description: The name for the security profile.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the security profile.

nested_items.name: AllowedAccessControlTags
nested_items.description: The list of tags that a security profile uses to restrict access to resources in Amazon Connect.

nested_items.name: TagRestrictedResources
nested_items.description: The list of resources that a security profile applies tag restrictions to in Amazon Connect.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when this resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where this resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: HierarchyRestrictedResources
nested_items.description: The list of resources that a security profile applies hierarchy restrictions to in Amazon Connect. Following are acceptable ResourceNames: User.

nested_items.name: AllowedAccessControlHierarchyGroupId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the hierarchy group that a security profile uses to restrict access to resources in Amazon Connect.
